description.zh-CN: 動畫計數器組件，以平滑計數動畫和過渡顯示數值。非常適合統計顯示、成就計數器和度量呈現，支持可自定義的動畫持續時間和緩動函數。
description.en-US: An animated counter component that displays numerical values with smooth counting animations and transitions. Perfect for statistics display, achievement counters, and metric presentations with customizable animation duration and easing functions.

description.zh-CN: 极简风格風格的动画计数器實現
description.en-US: A polished animated counter implementation with smooth number transitions, clear visual presentation, responsive sizing, and smooth animation effects. Effectively presents numerical data with engaging animation effects that draw attention and enhance visual appeal.

description.zh-CN: 拟物风格風格的动画计数器實現
description.en-US: Animated Counter implementation in Skeuomorphism style

description.zh-CN: Material Design風格的动画计数器實現
description.en-US: Animated Counter implementation in Material Design style

description.zh-CN: 终端风格風格的动画计数器實現
description.en-US: Animated Counter implementation in Terminal CLI style

description.zh-CN: 赛博朋克風格的动画计数器實現
description.en-US: Animated Counter implementation in Cyberpunk style
